orange_slimey.description: If you control 3 or more different Landscape types when Orange Slimey enters play, deal 3 Damage to your opponent.

palace_of_bone.description: Opposing Creatures in this Lane don't trigger entering or leaving play effects.

paladim.name: Paladim
paladim.description: Each Creature that changed Lanes this turn has +3 ATK this turn. (Opposing Creatures do not benefit from this.)

pants_of_awesome.name: Pants of Awesome
pants_of_awesome.description: Move target Creature you control to an empty Blue Plains Landscape you control, and then draw a card.

papercut_tiger.name: Papercut Tiger
papercut_tiger.description: While Papercut Tiger has exactly 5 Damage on it, it has +5 ATK.

parrotmilitary_outpost.name: Parrotmilitary Outpost
parrotmilitary_outpost.description: Each Creature in this Lane has -1 ATK (min 0).

patchy_the_pumpkin.name: Patchy the Pumpkin
patchy_the_pumpkin.description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature. Do this once for each Cornfield Landscape you control. (May only target each Creature once.)

peach_djinni.name: Peach Djinni
peach_djinni.description: When a SandyLands Creature enters play under your control, Peach Djinni has +1 ATK this turn.

pentaid.name: Pentaid
pentaid.description: Heal exactly 5 Damage from target Creature you control (no more and no less).

phyllis.name: Phyllis
phyllis.description: While her blade distracts you, her purse swings in for the whammy.

pickler.name: Pickler
pickler.description: Sacrifice Pickler >>> Deal 3 Damage to target Creature.

pieclops.name: Pieclops
pieclops.description: When Pieclops enters play, heal 1 Damage from each adjacent Creature.

piestorm.name: Piestorm
piestorm.description: Each of your Creatures with no Damage has +2 ATK this turn.

pink_candy.name: Pink Candy
pink_candy.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a SandyLands Landscape.

pink_merwitch.name: Pink Merwitch
pink_merwitch.description: Discard a card >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature. (Use only once during each of your turns.)

pirate_bear.name: Pirate Bear
pirate_bear.description: While Pirate Bear is on a Useless Swamp Landscape, it deals triple Damage.

polterclops.name: Polterclops
polterclops.description: +1 DEF for each different Landscape type you control.

popcorn_power.name: Popcorn Power
popcorn_power.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a Blue Plains Landscape.

portal_of_unsummoning.name: Portal of Unsummoning
portal_of_unsummoning.description: Return target Creature to its owner's hand.

portal_to_nowhere.name: Portal to Nowhere
portal_to_nowhere.description: Move 1 of your opponent's Creatures to an adjacent empty Lane (on his side).

psionic_architect.name: Psionic Architect
psionic_architect.description: When Psionic Architect enters play, you may ready a Flooped Creature you control.

psychic_tempest.name: Psychic Tempest
psychic_tempest.description: Return all Creatures in play you own to your hand. (This includes stolen Creatures.)

puma_paw.name: Puma Paw
puma_paw.description: Ready a Flooped Creature you control. It has +2 ATK this turn.

punk_cat.name: Punk Cat
punk_cat.description: Each Creature that changed Lanes this turn has +2 ATK this turn.

pyramidia.name: Pyramidia
pyramidia.description: FLOOP >>> If you control a Creature in this Lane, gain 1 Action. Use it only to play a Creature into this Lane.

quadurai.name: Quadurai
quadurai.description: At the start of you turn, deal 2 Damage to each opponent with 4 or more cards in hand.

quake_maker.name: Quake Maker
quake_maker.description: +2 ATK for each face-down Landscape in play.

quick_pick_me_up.name: Quick Pick Me Up
quick_pick_me_up.description: Return target Creature you control to its owner's hand. Gain Actions equal to its cost.

rainbow_eyebat.name: Rainbow Eyebat
rainbow_eyebat.description: At the start of your turn, you heal 1 Hit Point for each different Landscape type you control. (Can 't go over 25.)

raise_the_dead.name: Raise the Dead
raise_the_dead.description: Put a Creature with cost 2 or less from your discard pile into play.

rebounding_zebracorn.name: Rebounding Zebracorn
rebounding_zebracorn.description: +1 ATK for each different Landscape type you control.

reclaim_landscape.name: Reclaim Landscape
reclaim_landscape.description: You may flip one of your Landscapes face up, and you may move one of your Buildings to one of your Lanes without one.

red_eyeling.name: Red Eyeling
red_eyeling.description: FLOOP >>> Return a card with cost 0 from your discard pile to your hand.

reign_deer.name: Reign Deer
reign_deer.description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card for each Landscape with a Frozen token on it players control.

ring_of_damage.name: Ring of Damage
ring_of_damage.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn.

ring_of_fluffy.name: Ring of Fluffy
ring_of_fluffy.description: Target Creature you control has +X ATK this turn, where X is the amount of Damage on it.

ring_of_third_eye.name: Ring of Third Eye
ring_of_third_eye.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a Cornfield Landscape.

rock_'n_roller.name: Rock 'n Roller
rock_'n_roller.description: When Rock 'n Roller enters play, flip a Landscape in this Lane face down. When Rock 'n Roller leaves play, flip it face up.

rock_out!.name: Rock Out!
rock_out!.description: Flip target Landscape face down until the start of your next turn.

rocktopus.name: Rocktopus
rocktopus.description: Rocktopus has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a SandyLands Landscape.

sack_of_pain.name: Sack of Pain
sack_of_pain.description: While Sack of Pain has exactly 6 Damage on it, it has +6 ATK.

sand_angel.name: Sand Angel
sand_angel.description: Lie down in the sand, wave your arms and legs, and she will appear to you.

sand_eyebat.name: Sand Eyebat
sand_eyebat.description: When another Creature enters play under your control, Sand Eyebat gains 1 DEF.

sand_jackal.name: Sand Jackal
sand_jackal.description: While Sand Jackal is on a [NiceLands]] Landscape, when it defeats an opposing Creature, you heal 3 Hit Points.

sand_knights.name: Sand Knights
sand_knights.description: +2 ATK if you control a Blue Plains Landscape.

sand_pyramid.name: Sand Pyramid
sand_pyramid.description: Pay 2 Actions >>> Return each Creature in this Lane to its owner's hand. (Affects both players.)

sand_sphinx.name: Sand Sphinx
sand_sphinx.description: FLOOP >>> Return a Creature you control in this Lane to its owner's hand.

sand_witch.name: SandWitch
sand_witch.description: When SandWitch or another Creature enters play under your control, deal 1 Damage to your opponent.

sandasaurus_rex.name: Sandasaurus Rex
sandasaurus_rex.description: +2 ATK for each of your empty Lanes.

sandhorn_devil.name: Sandhorn Devil
sandhorn_devil.description: When Sandhorn Devil enters play, deal 1 Damage to each Creature in play, (including each of your Creatures).

sandmagus.name: Sandmagus
sandmagus.description: At the start of your turn, you may return Sandmagus to its owner's hand. If you do, each other Creature you control has +1 ATK this turn.

sandsnake.name: Sandsnake
sandsnake.description: When Sandsnake enters play, deal 4 Damage to target opposing Creature in this Lane.

schoolhouse.name: Schoolhouse
schoolhouse.description: FLOOP >>> Your Creature in this Lane loses all abilities and gains the FLOOP ability of a random Creature (with a FLOOP ability) in your discard pile until end of turn.

scroll_of_bad_breath.name: Scroll of Bad Breath
scroll_of_bad_breath.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a NiceLands Landscape.

scroll_of_fresh_breath.name: Scroll of Fresh Breath
scroll_of_fresh_breath.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape.

sea_hag.name: Sea Hag
sea_hag.description: Sea Hag has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape.

shadowy_pyramid.name: Shadowy Pyramid
shadowy_pyramid.description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card. If you control a Creature in this Lane, discard a card.

shark.name: Shark
shark.description: When a SandyLands Creature enters play during your turn (including Shark), it has +1 ATK this turn.

silo_of_freedom.name: Silo of Freedom
silo_of_freedom.description: Discard a card >>> Your Landscape in this Lane loses its type and becomes the type of your choice (except face down) until the start of your next turn.

silo_of_justice.name: Silo of Justice
silo_of_justice.description: Pay 1 Action >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature in this Lane and 1 Damage to its controller.

silo_of_truth.name: Silo of Truth
silo_of_truth.description: Pay 2 Actions >>> Steal a random card from your opponent and play it at no cost.

sinkhole.name: Sinkhole
sinkhole.description: Discard a card, FLOOP >>> Flip target Landscape in this Lane face down until the start of your next turn.

ska_pion.name: Ska-pion
ska_pion.description: Ska-pion costs 1 less to play while an opponent controls a Creature you own.

skeletal_hand.name: Skeletal Hand
skeletal_hand.description: FLOOP >>> Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Spell discarded this way, target player discards a card.

slay_rider.name: Slay Rider
slay_rider.description: FLOOP >>> Deal 3 Damage to target Creature on a Landscape with a Frozen token on it.

smoldering_elder.name: Smoldering Elder
smoldering_elder.description: When Smoldering Elder enters play, each player discards 2 cards.

snake_eye_ring.name: Snake Eye Ring
snake_eye_ring.description: Return a random Useless Swamp Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

snake_eyes.name: Snake Eyes
snake_eyes.description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape.

snakemint.name: Snakemint
snakemint.description: When Snakemint deals Damage to an opposing player, you heal that many Hit Points. (Cant ' go over 25.)

snow_angel.name: Snow Angel
snow_angel.description: FLOOP >>> Heal 1 Damage from each of your Creatures for each Landscape with a Frozen token on it players control.

snow_baller.name: Snow Baller
snow_baller.description: Remove a Frozen token from Snow Baller's Landscape >>> Deal 3 Damage to target Creature.

snow_bunny.name: Snow Bunny
snow_bunny.description: Destroy Snow Bunny >>> Freeze target Landscape.

snow_business.name: Snow Business
snow_business.description: Pay 1 Action >>> Freeze target Landscape in this Lane.

snow_dog.name: Snow Dog
snow_dog.description: FLOOP >>> Each adjacent Creature has +2 ATK this turn.

snow_training_camp.name: Snow Training Camp
snow_training_camp.description: FLOOP >>> Freeze both Landscapes in this Lane. Use only if no Frozen tokens are in play.

snowblower.name: Snowblower
snowblower.description: Choose a Lane. Freeze both Landscapes in that Lane.

snowvalanche.name: Snowvalanche
snowvalanche.description: Deal 2 Damage to each opposing Creature on a Landscape with a Frozen token on it.

socks_of_fortitude.name: Socks of Fortitude
socks_of_fortitude.description: Ready each Creature that changed Lanes this turn. They each have +2 ATK this turn.

spazzy_cola.name: Spazzy Cola
spazzy_cola.description: Each Creature in play has +1 ATK this turn (including your opponent's Creatures).

spell_warp.name: Spell Warp
spell_warp.description: Swap the positions of 2 Creatures you control. (They change Lanes simultaneously.)

spirit_tower.name: Spirit Tower
spirit_tower.description: Pay 1 Action and FLOOP >>> If you control no Creatures in this Lane, move target Creature in this Lane to your side and ready it. At end of turn, return it to its owner's side.

sprucy_lucy.name: Sprucy Lucy
sprucy_lucy.description: Sprucy Lucy has +1 ATK for each Landscape with a Frozen token on it players control.

squatting_bald_man.name: Squatting Bald Man
squatting_bald_man.description: Discard a card >>> Heal 1 Damage from Squatting Bald Man. (Use any number of times during each of your turns.)

static_parrotrooper.name: Static Parrotrooper
static_parrotrooper.description: When Static Parrotrooper enters play, move it to any empty Landscape. It cannot be replaced. At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your Hero.

steakchop.name: Steakchop
steakchop.description: At the start of your turn, discard 2 cards or destroy Steakchop. (Discard after your free draw.)

strawberry_slimey.name: Strawberry Slimey
strawberry_slimey.description: If you control 3 or more different Landscape types when Strawberry Slimey enters play, heal 4 Damage from each Creature you control.

struzann_jinn.name: Struzann Jinn
struzann_jinn.description: +2 ATK for each Flooped Creature you control.

subliminal_strength.name: Subliminal Strength
subliminal_strength.description: Target Creature you control has +2 ATK this turn for each Spell you played this turn (including this one).

sun_king.name: Sun King
sun_king.description: Sun King counts as an additional Cornfield Landscape you control.

sundae_school.name: Sundae School
sundae_school.description: While you have an even amount of Hit Points, your Creature on this Landscape has +2 ATK.

swamp_horn.name: Swamp Horn
swamp_horn.description: +1 DEF for each different Landscape type you control.

tn_timmy.name: TNTimmy
tn_timmy.description: When TNTimmy leaves play, deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature.

tapped_out.name: Tapped Out
tapped_out.description: Target Creature you control has +2 ATK for each exhausted Creature you control (at the time you play this).

tax_reduction.name: Tax Reduction
tax_reduction.description: You may move each of your Buildings to different Lanes you control. You may move each of your opponent 's Buildings to different Lanes he controls.

teeth_leaf.name: Teeth Leaf
teeth_leaf.description: If you have 10 or more cards in your discard pile, pay 2 fewer Actions to play Teeth Leaf.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Move one of your Creatures to one of your empty Lanes.

temple_of_the_sun.name: Temple of the Sun
temple_of_the_sun.description: When a SandyLands Creature with cost 1 or greater you control enters play in this Lane, you may return it to its owner's hand.

the_big_hen_house.name: The Big Hen House
the_big_hen_house.description: At the start of your turn, deal 1 or 2 Damage to your Creature in this Lane, then you heal 1 HP (Max 25).

the_cooler.name: The Cooler
the_cooler.description: When The Cooler leaves play, Freeze its Landscape.

the_mariachi.name: The Mariachi
the_mariachi.description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for each Creature that entered play this turn.

the_pig.name: The Pig
the_pig.description: FLOOP >>> Flip target Cornfield Landscape in this Lane face down.

the_sludger.name: The Sludger
the_sludger.description: FLOOP >>> Choose a card name. Remove each card with that name in target player's discard pile from the game.

timmy_magic_eyes.name: Timmy Magic Eyes
timmy_magic_eyes.description: Timmy Magic Eyes has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a Blue Plains Landscape.

tired_wombat.name: Tired Wombat
tired_wombat.description: At the start of your turn, move Tired Wombat to an empty Landscape you control. If you cannot, move it to an empty Landscape your opponent controls.

toilet_of_doom.name: Toilet of Doom
toilet_of_doom.description: Target Creature you control has +1 ATK this turn for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

tome_of_ankhs.name: Tome of Ankhs
tome_of_ankhs.description: Draw a card for each of your empty Lanes.

travelin'_farmer.name: Travelin' Farmer
travelin'_farmer.description: When Travelin' Farmer leaves play, deal 1 Damage to your opponent for each card in his hand.

travelin'_skeleton.name: Travelin' Skeleton
travelin'_skeleton.description: FLOOP >>> Travelin' Skeleton and another Creature you control change Lanes with each other.

travelin'_wizard.name: Travelin' Wizard
travelin'_wizard.description: When Travelin' Wizard enters play, the opposing Creature in this Lane and Travelin' Wizard switch sides.

tree_of_undeath.name: Tree of Undeath
tree_of_undeath.description: FLOOP >>> Return a random Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

unempty_coffin.name: Unempty Coffin
unempty_coffin.description: Reduce the cost of the next Creature you play this turn by 2 Actions.

uni_knight.name: Uni-Knight
uni_knight.description: Pay 1 Action >>> Target Creature in this Lane has -10 ATK this turn.

unicyclops.name: Unicyclops
unicyclops.description: At the start of your turn, each player draws a card and then discards a card.

volcano.name: Volcano
volcano.description: Destroy target Building. You may deal 3 Damage to a Creature in that Lane. Flip your Landscape in that Lane face down.

wall_of_chocolate.name: Wall of Chocolate
wall_of_chocolate.description: While Wall of Chocolate has no Damage on it, it has +3 ATK.

wall_of_ears.name: Wall of Ears
wall_of_ears.description: +1 DEF for each Cornfield Landscape in play (counting all players).

wall_of_sand.name: Wall of Sand
wall_of_sand.description: If one or more other SandyLands Creatures enter play during your turn, Wall of Sand has +2 ATK this turn.

wandering_bald_man.name: Wandering Bald Man
wandering_bald_man.description: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your discard pile.

weakened_warrior.name: Weakened Warrior
weakened_warrior.description: Weakened Warrior comes into play exhausted and does not ready at the start of your turn. Whenever Weakened Warrior changes Lanes, ready it.

weary_trading_post.name: Weary Trading Post
weary_trading_post.description: FLOOP >> Move an exhausted Creature you control to this Landscape (if empty).

well_dressed_wolf.name: Well-Dressed Wolf
well_dressed_wolf.description: Well-Dressed Wolf has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a Cornfield Landscape.

windmill_of_health.name: Windmill of Health
windmill_of_health.description: While your Creature in this Lane has no Damage on it, it has +2 ATK.

witch_slap.name: Witch Slap
witch_slap.description: Target opponent discards down to 5 cards, and then takes 1 Damage for each card discarded this way.

witch_way.name: Witch Way
witch_way.description: Each of your Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape has +2 ATK this turn.

woad_blood.name: Woad Blood
woad_blood.description: Each Creature that changed Lanes this turn has +2 ATK this turn.

woad_mobile_home.name: Woad Mobile Home
woad_mobile_home.description: FLOOP >>> Move a Creature in an empty adjacent Lane to this Lane (if empty).

woad_talisman.name: Woad Talisman
woad_talisman.description: Target Blue Plains Creature you control has +2 ATK this run.

woadic_chief.name: Woadic Chief
woadic_chief.description: Woadic Chief has +2 ATK this turn for each Spell you have played this turn.

woadic_marauder.name: Woadic Marauder
woadic_marauder.description: When Woadic Marauder changes Lanes during a turn, draw a card.

woadic_ring_leader.name: Woadic Ring Leader
woadic_ring_leader.description: At the start of your turn, move Woadic Ring Leader to an empty Landscape you control. If you cannot, destroy it.

yellow_gnome.name: Yellow Gnome
yellow_gnome.description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature that is on a NiceLands Landscape.

yellow_lighthouse.name: Yellow Lighthouse
yellow_lighthouse.description: At the start of your turn, each players who controls a Creature in this Lane draws a card.

yellow_slimey.name: Yellow Slimey
yellow_slimey.description: While you control 3 or more different Landscape types, Yellow Slimey has +3 ATK.

za_zo's_magic_seeds.name: ZaZo's Magic Seeds
za_zo's_magic_seeds.description: Target SandyLands Creature has +2 ATK this turn for each Creature that entered play into an adjacent Lane this turn.

corns_templar.name: Corns Templar
corns_templar.description: FLOOP >>> Heal 1 Damage from Corns Templar.

sharp_guy.name: Sharp Guy
sharp_guy.description: FLOOP >>> Deal 2 Damage to target opposing Creature in this Lane.

kernel_queen.name: Kernel Queen
kernel_queen.description: Kernel Queen has +1 ATK for each Flooped Creature you control.

lumbercaddy.name: Lumbercaddy
lumbercaddy.description: FLOOP >>> Move target Building you control to any Landscape without one.

husker_champion.name: Husker Champion
husker_champion.description: Husker Champion has +2 ATK and +2 DEF if you control a Building on this Landscape.

druid_of_the_cob.name: Druid of the Cob
druid_of_the_cob.description: Flooped Creatures you control have +1 ATK.

popcorn_butteredfly.name: Popcorn Butteredfly
popcorn_butteredfly.description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card for each Building you control.

helping_hand.name: Helping Hand
helping_hand.description: FLOOP >>> Return a Building from your discard pile to your hand.

burly_lumberjack.name: Burly Lumberjack
burly_lumberjack.description: You may play additional Buildings onto this Landscape.

husker_valkyrie.name: Husker Valkyrie
husker_valkyrie.description: Husker Valkyrie has +2 ATK and +2 DEF if you control a Building on this Landscape.

tough_lumberjill.name: Tough Lumberjill
tough_lumberjill.description: When Tough Lumberjill enters play, deal 1 Damage to your opponent for each Building you control.

friendship_bracelet.name: Friendship Bracelet
friendship_bracelet.description: Swap any amount of Damage between two Creatures you control.

singing_sword.name: Singing Sword
singing_sword.description: Target Creature has +1 ATK this turn for every 2 cards you have drawn this turn.

sword_bouquet.name: Sword Bouquet
sword_bouquet.description: Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for every card you have drawn this turn.

vampire_lord.name: Vampire Lord
vampire_lord.description: When Vampire Lord deals damage, heal that much Damage from him.

emboldened_retriever.name: Emboldened Retriever
emboldened_retriever.description: Each time Eboldened Retriever attacks, you may deaw a card. Much ball. Wow.

crazy_cat_lady.name: Crazy Cat Lady
crazy_cat_lady.description: Rainbow Creatures you control have +1 ATK.

impossible_possum.name: Impossible Possum
impossible_possum.description: When this card is placed into your discard pile from anywhere, you may discard a card from your hand to return Impossible Possum to your hand.

woadic_enchantress.name: Woadic Enchantress
woadic_enchantress.description: Creatures in this Lane cannot use Floop abilities.

furious_furor.name: Furious Furor
furious_furor.description: Target Creature has +2 ATK this turn for each Flooped Creature you control.

harvest_moon.name: Harvest Moon
harvest_moon.description: Put a Building from your discard pile into play.

archer_danica.name: Archer Danica
archer_danica.description: Destroy a Building you control and Floop >>> Deal 3 damage to each opposing Creature.

pied_piper.name: Pied Piper
pied_piper.description: When Pied Piper attacks an opposing Creature, you may have a Flooped Creature you control attack it instead.

tornado_wall_of_fire.name: Tornado Wall Of Fire
tornado_wall_of_fire.description: FLOOP >>> Tornado Wall of Fire has +3 ATK while Flooped.

loonely_panda.name: Loonely Panda
loonely_panda.description: When Lonely Panda enters play, if you control no other Creatures, draw a card.

infant_scholar.name: Infant Scholar
infant_scholar.description: If you played one or more Rainbow cards this turn, Infant Scholar has +3 ATK this turn.

tiny_elephant.name: Tiny Elephant
tiny_elephant.description: While in play, Tiny Elephant is also a Rainbow Creature (in addition to Blue Plains).

psionic_swashbuckler.name: Psionic Swashbuckler
psionic_swashbuckler.description: When Psionic Swashbuckler enters play, you may deal 3 Damage to target Flooped Creature

business_dog.name: Business Dog
business_dog.description: Business Dog has +2 ATK this turn for each card you have played "Dog" or "Puppy" in its tile this turn.

fiddling_ferret.name: Fiddling Ferret
fiddling_ferret.description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card, and then discard a card. If you discard a Rainbow card this way, gain 1 Action.

the_dog.name: The Dog
the_dog.description: FLOOP >>> Opposing Buildings in this Lane are blank while The Dog is Flooped "Woof."

celestial_fortress.name: Celestial Fortress
celestial_fortress.description: The opposing Creature in this Lane has -2 DEF.

blood_castle.name: Blood Castle
blood_castle.description: Each time an opposing Creature in this Lane takes Damage, increase the amount by 1.

farmhouse.name: Farmhouse
farmhouse.description: Farmhouse counts as an additional Cornfield Landscape you control.

fionna.name: Fionna
fionna.description: While you control only one Landscape type, your Rainbow Creatures have +1 ATK.

cake.name: Cake
cake.description: Each time a Building enters play under your control, heal 2 Damage from each Creature you control with a Building on its Landscape.
